titleStmt.title: A fight the Lord Goring beaten at Coulchester in Essex. The suburbs taken by the Lord Generall, part of it fired. Sir Thomas Honyvvood taken prisoner, and 20 killed. Killed of the enemy 100. and taken 500 prisoners. With the particulars of the said fight. Also a declaration from the gentlemen of South-Wales. And the proceedings of Lieutenant Generall Crumwell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Smithurst, and are to be sold neer Hosier-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
